column4: I'm trying to dual boot vista and feisty, but vista is stopping grub from getting to the boot stage. How do I fix that?
i've heard that problem, easiest way, might be to put grub on a bootable floppy or usb pen drive
i've been hearing grub problems with vista.... maybe they are exaggerated, i don't know.... i'd look into creating a bootable floppy.
just google "SUper Grub Disk", and create a bootable floppy... it'll end your headaches
